feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-11T12:06:33.070732Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;CIA 2010 秘密通信网站</stitle>; <id>;https://cirosantilli.com/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -11T09:05:43.278694Z</updated>; <link href="https://cirosantilli.com/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites"/>; <author>; <name>;hosteur</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hosteur</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cirosantilli/media/ master/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites/screenshots/feedsdemexicoyelmundo.com.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：159px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了中央情报局在 2000 年代末至 2010 年代初使用的秘密通信渠道网站，直到被目标国家发现，导致数项资产被监禁和处决。这篇文章提供了有关网站数量及其用途的信息，以及为发现更多此类网站所做的努力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cia-2010-covert-communication-websites" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36279375" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;550 万《孢子》用户上传了约 1.91 亿的作品，并且还在增加</stitle>; <id>;http://www.spore.com/rest/stats</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-11T09:05:43.279341Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.spore.com/rest/stats"/>; <author>; <name>;DangerousYams</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DangerousYams</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;1913403103535594301100 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#5-5m- spore-users-have-uploaded-some-191m-creations-and-counting" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36279341" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;CS:GO：从零到零日</stitle>; <id>;https://neodyme.io/blog/csgo_from_zero_to_0day/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T08:05:43.279775Z< /updated>; <link href="https://neodyme.io/blog/csgo_from_zero_to_0day/"/>; <author>; <name>;pizza</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =披萨</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://neodyme.io/assets/csgo.f41c0e91_1Aeymb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;在热门游戏《反恐精英：全球攻势》中发现了三个严重的远程代码执行漏洞，这些漏洞可以在游戏客户端连接到恶意服务器时触发，并进行了概念验证漏洞被提出。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cs-go-from-zero-to-0-day" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279129" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;黑匣子是解决飞机失事的关键——为什么它们不是更好？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.afar. com/magazine/how-black-boxes-changed-air-travel</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T11:05:43.280184Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.afar.com /magazine/how-black-boxes-changed-air-travel"/>; <author>; <name>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://afar.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/bd882df/2147483647/strip/true/crop/1920x1080+0+0/resize/400x225 !/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fafar-media-production-web.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fbrightspot%2F25%2F66%2F3e0cc8cb4ccb9f73c4c0a7dc7f6a%2Fafar-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;法航 447 航班黑匣子的回收提供了有关飞机最后时刻的关键信息，揭示了导致致命坠机的一系列事故。这一事件凸显了过度的危险- 对自动化的依赖，并导致了全球飞行员如何处理高海拔紧急情况的新培训程序。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#black-boxes-are-key-to-solving- plane-crashes-why-aren-t-they-better" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;开源的不对称性</stitle>; <id>;https://matt.life/writing/the-asymmetry-of-open-source</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T09:05:43.280613Z</更新>; <link href="https://matt.life/writing/the-asymmetry-of-open-source"/>; <作者>; <名称>; ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://matt.生活/资源/图像/macbook-cover.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;开源的不对称性是可持续性问题的核心。虽然项目需要用户创建社区并在代码上进行协作，但没有它们它们仍然可以运行。本文讨论了不同的类型开源工作的重要性以及维护者和用户之间建立健康关系以确保可持续性的必要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-asymmetry-of-open-source" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279403" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在成为 Unabomber 之前，Ted Kaczynski 是一名精神控制测试对象</stitle>; <id >;https://www.washingtonpost.com/history/2023/06/11/unabomber-ted-kaczynski-harvard-experiment/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:05:43.281060Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/history/2023/06/11/unabomber-ted-kaczynski-harvard-experiment/"/>; <author>; <name>;whitepaint</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=whitepaint</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/ imrs.php?src=https://arc-anglerfish-washpost-prod-washpost.s3.amazonaws.com/public/G7IS3TPAHWWIGQ6RXWNOJF7HTU.jpg&w=1440" style="width: 220px; height: 155px;" />;<br />;Ted Kaczynski，被称为 Unabomber，曾是一名数学专业学生，后来成为国内恐怖分子，目标是学术界、科学家和工业化社会。他也是哈佛大学开展的一项实验的参与者中央情报局支持的心理学家 Henry A. Murray 试图了解如何控制受试者的思想。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#before-he-was-the-unabomber -ted-kaczynski-was-a-mind-control-test-subject" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279639 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="文本">;可搜索和排序的 H1B 工资数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://jobsort.com/h1b</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T04:05:43.281476Z</updated>; <link href=" https://jobsort.com/h1b"/>; <author>; <name>;jobsort</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jobsort</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;H1B 数据已被过滤，仅包括软件工程、生物医学、管理和首席执行官。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#searchable-and-sortable-h1b-salary-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36277706" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;破坏苹果著名的 iPhone 安全性的湾区德国酒吧</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sfgate.com/tech/article/bay-area- german-bar-iphone-security-breach-18130468.php</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T09:05:43.281895Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sfgate.com/tech /article/bay-area-german-bar-iphone-security-breach-18130468.php"/>; <author>; <name>;wallflower</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =wallflower</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.hdnux.com/photos/01/23/54/65/21941575/3/1200x0.jpg " style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;2010 年，一位醉酒的 Apple 软件工程师将 iPhone 4 原型机留在了德国一家啤酒馆内的高脚凳上，随后该原型机被盗并以 5,000 美元的价格卖给了科技博客 Gizmodo。这一事件引起了媒体的狂热报道，并指责当时的首席执行官史蒂夫乔布斯敲诈勒索。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-bay-area-german-bar-that-brought-down-apples-famed-iphone-security" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270802" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;小网站小奖</stitle>; <id>;https://tinyawards.net/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T03:05:43.282383Z</更新>; <link href="https://tinyawards.net/"/>; <author>; <name>;noflag</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=noflag</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://asset.mmm.page/13/54757e3d654172a6eaf2f6ce16aa33/17ur1tz.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：230px；" />;<br />;The Tiny Awards 是一个非商业奖项，由一个小型评选委员会颁发给体现小型、真诚网络理念的网站。获胜者将获得实物奖杯和 500 美元的现金奖励。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tiny-awards-for-small-websites" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36267362" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;奥本海默的情妇离奇死亡 (2015)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.nuclearsecrecy.com/2015/12/11/the-curious-death-of -oppenheimers-mistress/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T04:05:43.282828Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.nuclearsecrecy.com/2015/12/11/the-curious -death-of-oppenheimers-mistress/"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.nuclearsecrecy.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Jean-Tatlock.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：88px；" />;<br />;曼哈顿最新一集 209 与让·塔特洛克 (Jean Tatlock) 相关的次要情节联系在一起，他可能已被为曼哈顿计划安全工作的情报人员谋杀。奥本海默与塔特洛克的故事得到了详细探讨，包括奥本海默在 1943 年秘密访问塔特洛克，当时情报人员正在跟踪这次访问。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-curious-death-of-oppenheimers-mistress-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36277696" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;购买整个 Egghead 软件商店 (2005)</stitle>; <id>;https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050824-11/?p= 34463</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T08:05:43.283249Z</更新>; <link href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050824-11/?p=34463"/>; <author>; <name>;kaladin-jasnah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaladin-jasnah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2019/02/ShowCover.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：290px；" />;<br />;Windows 95 的开发经理在当地的 Egghead 软件商店购买了每个 PC 程序的副本，以确保应用程序的兼容性。 Windows 95 团队成员被邀请负责最多两个程序，作为交换，他们必须在 Windows 95 发布后保留它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#buying-an-entire-egghead-software-store-2005" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36274644" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Twitter 拒绝支付其 Google Cloud 账单</stitle>; <id>;https://tech.seposts.com/2023/06/twitter-is-refusing -to-pay-its-google.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T11:22:43.283662Z</更新>; <link href="https://tech.seposts.com/2023/06/ twitter-is-refusing-to-pay-its-google.html"/>; <author>; <name>;sillicontech</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sillicontech</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEiMOJl6Ktxb1ZRPVtdA1RHSAJkB4FkohlAaMRTzxZ1DOg67MjSUOCm6NSuo0_t5cHapT8cyHxDnMFGjZzo9cm4i3YY _DdOFdfBBudOYIYaX03uNMYA76cgR28aUHf1eevOovkfUB3b2qpxuwhhahOOjksgCS4ik5XUExS4lOujCE-LrC0DdBpgvFTw3JQ/w640-h400/peakpx.jpg" 样式="宽度: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;据报道，Twitter 在本月即将续签合同时拒绝支付其 Google Cloud 账单。这可能会对这家社交媒体公司的信任和安全团队产生影响。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#twitter-is-refusing-to-pay-its-google-cloud-bills" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我创建了 Clippy [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3kcQzCzSDvc</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:05:43.284076Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3kcQzCzSDvc"/>; <author>; <name>;rhema</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rhema</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/3kcQzCzSDvc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-created-clippy-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;你能相信 ChatGPT 的软件包推荐吗？</ stitle>; <id>;https://vulcan.io/blog/ai-hallucinations-package-risk</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T09:05:43.284492Z</更新>; <link href="https: //vulcan.io/blog/ai-hallucinations-package-risk"/>; <author>; <name>;DantesKite</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DantesKite</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vulcan.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/AI-PoC-2.png" style="width: 220px ; height: 110px;" />;<br />;攻击者可以利用ChatGPT的幻觉倾向，将恶意包传播到开发者的环境中。这是由于ChatGPT生成的URL、引用，甚至代码库和函数实际上并不存在，这可以被攻击者用来用他们自己的恶意包替换 ChatGPT 推荐的“假”包。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#can-you-trust-chatgpts-package-recommendations" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279496" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;硬盘容量的巨大飞跃：32 TB HAMR 驱动器即将推出，40 TB 即将推出</stitle>; <id>;https://www.anandtech.com/show/18901/big-leap-for-hdds-32-tb-hamr-drive-is-coming-40tb-on-horizo​​n</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T22:05:43.284920Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.anandtech.com/show/18901/big-leap-for-hdds-32-tb-hamr- drive-is-coming-40tb-on-horizo​​n"/>; <author>; <name>;walterbell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=walterbell</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.anandtech.com/doci/18901/HAMR-actuator-head-and-laser-illustration-hero_678x452.jpg" style="width: 220px ; height: 124px;" />;<br />;希捷将推出采用热辅助磁记录 (HAMR) 技术的下一代硬盘，首款商用 HAMR 硬盘将于 2023 年第三季度提供 32 TB 的容量。新的记录技术将使容量相对快速地增加到 40 TB，大容量 HAMR HDD 将与尚未发布的 24 TB 和 28 TB 驱动器共存。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#big-leap-for-hard-drive-capacities-32-tb-hamr-drives-due-soon-40tb-on-horizo​​n" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36253499" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;杂货店合并？不太好</stitle>; <id>;https://waterwrights.net/grocery-mergers-not-so-good- january-16-2023/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T02:05:43.285402Z</updated>; <link href="https://waterwrights.net/grocery-mergers-not-so-good- january-16-2023/"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;此帐户已被暂停。有关详细信息，请联系您的托管服务提供商。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#grocery-mergers-not-so-good" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36264717" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Merklizing 键/值存储以获得乐趣和利润</stitle>; <id>;https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023-05-04/merklizing-the-key-价值商店的乐趣和利润</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T03:05:43.285832Z</更新>; <link href="https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023-05 -04/merklizing-the-key-value-store-for-fun-and-profit"/>; <author>; <name>;joelg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =joelg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023-05-04/Component%2017.png" style="宽度： 220 像素；高度：80 像素；" />;<br />;本文讨论了使用 Prolly Trees（一种 Merkle 树）有效地比较两个键/值存储的内容并识别差异。此功能有多种应用，包括作为 CRDT 系统的持久层和去中心化数据库的基础。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#merklizing-the-key-value-store-for-fun-and-profit" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265429" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么在 Erlang VM 上进行机器学习？</stitle>; <id>;https://underjord.io/why-ml-on-erlang。 html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T23:05:43.286254Z</更新>; <link href="https://underjord.io/why-ml-on-erlang.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;法维克</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=法维克</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /underjord.io/img/logo2.svg" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;作者讨论了他们对机器学习及其实际应用的看法，特别是在实时字幕和数据处理等实用任务中。他们还比较了在机器学习项目中使用 Python 和 Elixir 的优缺点。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-do-ml-on-the-erlang-vm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36255546" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Total recall: the people who never forget (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2017/feb/08 /total-recall-the-people-who-never-forget</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T05:05:43.286665Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/ science/2017/feb/08/total-recall-the-people-who-never-forget"/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/9d3e91c957a5c51b49022cc4c29a215c133653df/0_114_3048_1829/master/3048.jpg? width=465&quality=85&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;Jill Price 有一种称为高度自传体记忆 (HSAM) 的疾病，这使她能够非常详细地记住她生命中的大部分日子。她是第一个被诊断出患有这种疾病的人，现在已知大约有 60 人患有这种疾病。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#total-recall-the-people-who-never-forget-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36275943" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;花生酱水母时间</stitle>; <id>;https://gebir.ge/blog/peanut-butter-jellyfin-time/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T22:05:43.287230Z</更新>; <link href="https://gebir.ge/blog/peanut-butter-jellyfin-time/"/>; <author>; <name>;makrelmad </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=makrelmad</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了两个 CVE 的发现过程，允许在未打补丁的 Jellyfin 实例上执行远程代码。作者专注于 REST API 和文件上传端点来利用这些漏洞。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#peanut-butter-jellyfin-time" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36275377" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;奶酪、老鼠和吉芬商品</stitle>; <id>;https://timharford.com/2023/06/the-cheese-the-rats-and-why-some-of -us-are-poorer-than-others/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T05:05:43.287661Z</updated>; <link href="https://timharford.com/2023/06/the -cheese-the-rats-and-why-some-of-us-are-poorer-than-others/"/>; <author>; <name>;background</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=background</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://timharford.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Back_View-DD@ 0.5x-1-1024x654.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：141px；" />;<br />;得克萨斯州的实验室老鼠帮助经济学家发现了吉芬商品的存在，吉芬商品是由于消费者被逼到角落而价格上涨时会被更多消费的商品。基本食品与吉芬相邻，是买不起高级食品的人的最后选择。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cheese-rats-and-giffen-goods" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36265786" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;电动汽车对环境更有利，无论电源如何</stitle>; <id>;https://www.popsci.com/technology/are-electric-cars-better -for-the-environment/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T11:05:43.288302Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.popsci.com/technology/are-electric-cars -better-for-the-environment/"/>; <author>; <name>;jahnu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jahnu</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://www.popsci.com/uploads/2023/05/25/are-electric-cars-better-for-the-environment.jpg?auto=webp&width= 1440&height=810" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;尽管人们担心生产电动汽车对环境的影响，但专家表示，与汽油或柴油动力车型相比，它们对环境的影响仍然更好。电动汽车产生的温室气体排放量更少，并且没有尾气排放，从而减少了当地的空气污染。与汽油车相比，电动汽车的生产和运营成本的盈亏平衡点出现在大约两年内，或大约 20,000 至 50,000 英里。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#electric-cars-are-better-for-the-environment-no-matter-the-power-source" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279925" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;将愚蠢的推文变成楔形文字平板电脑</stitle>; <id>;https://dumbcuneiform.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T23:05:43.288708Z</updated>; <link href="https://dumbcuneiform.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;cainxinth</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cainxinth</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dumbcuneiform.com/content/polyglot/images/intro-image .jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：113px；" />;<br />;这篇文章介绍了一种服务，该服务可以创建手掌大小的粘土板，上面刻有楔形文字以表示短消息，例如情书或推文。这些平板电脑是手工制作的，需要几周的时间来制作和运送。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#turn-dumb-tweets-into-cuneiform-tablets" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36275974" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;梭子鱼敦促更换而不是修补其电子邮件安全网关</stitle>; <id>;https://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/06/barracuda-urges-replacing-not -patching-its-email-security-gateways/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T21:05:43.289115Z</更新>; <link href="https://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/06/barracuda -urges-replacing-not-patching-its-email-security-gateways/"/>; <author>; <name>;LinuxBender</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=LinuxBender< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://krebsonsecurity.com/b-mandiant/3.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：198px；" />;<br />;Barracuda Networks 已敦促客户更换其电子邮件安全网关 (ESG) 设备，而不是在先前未知的漏洞被攻击者利用后仅应用软件更新。该公司表示，该恶意软件是在允许攻击者对设备进行持续后门访问的设备子集上识别出来的，并且在某些系统上发现了数据泄露的证据。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#barracuda-urges-replacing-not-patching-its-email-security-gateways" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36274525" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Fluent – 用于自然翻译的本地化系统</stitle>; <id>;https://projectfluent.org/</id>; <updated >;2023-06-11T01:05:43.289502Z</updated>; <link href="https://projectfluent.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;croes</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=croes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Fluent 是一个本地化系统，它通过使用多个类别的标识符和变体来简化翻译。它还包括其他消息可以引用的术语，以实现一致性和品牌修改。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fluent-a-localization-system-for-natural-sounding-translations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36276791" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gren – 一把 Elm 叉子</stitle>; <id>;https://gren-lang.org/</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 10T21:05:43.289882Z</updated>; <link href="https://gren-lang.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;jgilias</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=jgilias</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gren-lang.org/big_icon.png" style="width: 220px; 高度: 220 像素;" />;<br />;Gren 是一种函数式编程语言，具有精心管理的副作用和强大的静态类型系统。该语言由一些具有人类可读名称的概念组成，这些概念很好地组合在一起，因此您可以事半功倍。用 Gren 编写的程序很简单，很少或没有运行时异常，并且使用起来很有趣。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gren-an-elm-fork" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36274813" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;Intel x86-SIMD-sort (AVX-512) 性能分析</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Voultapher/sort-research-rs/blob/main /writeup/intel_avx512/text.md</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T19:05:43.290266Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Vultapher/sort-research-rs/ blob/main/writeup/intel_avx512/text.md"/>; <author>; <name>;Twirrim</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Twirrim</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Vultapher/sort-research-rs/main/writeup/intel_avx512/assets/hot-u64-10k-windows.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：289px；" />;<br />;英特尔发布了一个新的 AVX-512 排序库，它比其他通用排序实现要快得多。然而，基准测试很复杂，不同实现的性能可能因输入大小和模式等因素而异。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-performance-analysis-of-intel-x86-simd-sort-avx-512" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36273544" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;现代生活是垃圾：陶林的台北（2013）</stitle>; <id>;https://themillions.com/2013/06 /modern-life-is-rubbish-tao-lins-taipei.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T06:05:43.290743Z</updated>; <link href="https://themillions.com/ 2013/06/modern-life-is-rubbish-tao-lins-taipei.html"/>; <author>; <name>;occurrence</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= occurrence</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Eric liu：读台北，我想知道，他为什么恨我？，就像人们对恶霸或恐怖分子的好奇一样。他的评论家说，读这本小说让我觉得这本小说对生命是危险和威胁的。她说，一本讽刺反选择者的书不如赞美其作者的书好，但总比反选择者好 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#modern-life-is- rubbish-tao-lins-taipei-2013" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265759" target="_blank">; [评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;五种农业技术应对气候变化- 变化威胁</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles/climate-change-will-upend-agriculture-here-are-five-technologies-that-c​​ould-help-b854770f</id >; <更新>;2023-06-11T07:05:43.291136Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/climate-change-will-upend-agriculture-here-are-five -technologies-that-c​​ould-help-b854770f"/>; <author>; <name>;lxm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lxm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.wsj.net/im-792993/?width=1278&size=1" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;气候变化对农业构成重大威胁，包括降雨量更大、冬天更严酷以及致病虫害。科学家预测，这些挑战将导致水土流失、生长条件发生变化以及害虫范围扩大。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#five-farming-technologies-tackle-climate-change-threats" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36266895" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;伦敦电视工作室的不完整历史</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tvstudiohistory.co.uk/</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-11T02:05:43.291522Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tvstudiohistory.co.uk/"/>; <author>; <name>;timthorn</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=timthorn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.tvstudiohistory.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/ 2021/06/Homepage_top_image-e1623009924952-768x851.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：244px；" />;<br />;马丁·肯普顿 (Martin Kempton) 是一位退休的灯光总监，曾在伦敦的大部分电视演播室工作过，他在 2006 年创建了一个网站来记录这些演播室的历史。多年来，该网站不断更新，来自 350 多人的贡献，包括有关行业设施和定义的信息，以及一个支持行业技术专业人员的慈善机构 Backup Tech 的部分。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-incomplete-history-of-londons-television-studios" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36256133" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
